scripts.jQuery: cd bower_components/jQuery/ && npm run build && cd ../../ && cp bower_components/jQuery/dist/jquery.min.js vendor/
scripts.modernizr: cd bower_components/modernizr/ && npm install && ./bin/modernizr -c lib/config-all.json && cd ../../ && cp bower_components/modernizr/modernizr.js vendor/
scripts.vendor: npm run fontawesome && npm run jQuery && npm run matchMedia && npm run modernizr
scripts.post: postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-mixins -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer -u postcss-simple-vars -u cssnano --local-plugins -c options.js -d css post/*.css
